about_the_game:
The King craves treasures, and YOU are the miner tasked with finding them. Dig up the riches, and survive the dangers of the mine!

MINE

Dig through the mine to find different kinds of ores, each worth a different amount. From simple copper to rare adamant, everything can be sold to make money!

GEAR UP

Upgrade your tools to become a better miner! Buy stronger equipment to dig deeper, mine faster, and uncover the rarest treasures hidden underground.

OVERCOME

Beware of the dangers lurking in the mine! Face off against goblins, spiders, and other threats as you dig deeper. Stay alert, or risk losing your hard-earned treasures.

TRIBUTE

Keep the King happy by delivering treasures to him before his patience runs out! Complete tributes to earn his favor and receive random magical items as a reward for your loyalty.

Game features described above are currently in development and subject to change.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux distribution released after 2016
  • Processor: 64 bit CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU with Vulkan 1.0 support
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: System requirements are subject to change during development
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux distribution released after 2020
  • Processor: 64 bit CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: System requirements are subject to change during development
